name: Cya Veran Epona
description:
Link is searching for a specific Cya Veran Epona vulnerability ID can you help him finding the one matching the following description ? "It has been declared at the end of 2021 in the Hyrule field, but seems that was possible to exploit it since 2009. The vulnerability allows a monster to LPE to root user using few lines of code. It has a score of 7.8 and impact almost all Linux distribution."
**Level**: Easy **Format**: R2Lille{ID} **Author**: Mizu

name: My first colored temple
description: **Level**: Easy **Author**: Mizu, Ooggle

name: Perfect Sound Box
description:
In his conquest of the fire temple, Link found a weird sound box in a chest. Help him to find what it is hidding!
**Level:** Medium **Author:** Mizu

name: Mystic chest
description: **Level:** Medium **Author:** Mizu

name: Chest flipping
description:
After getting robbed two time in row, link decided to use the modern AES cipher to secure is rupees chest. He said that using it, opening his chest became impossible. Prove the oposite one last time and open the chest.
**Level:** Hard **Author:** Mizu

name: ROX my cipher
description:
After his first failure while creating his cipher, Link decide to create a new one that must be undefeatable. Prove the oposite and open the door again. PS: He used the following command to get cipher.txt ```sh python run.py -c clear_text.txt -o flag.enc ```
**Level:** Medium **Author:** Mizu

name: My first cipher
description:
Link decided to learn crypto to lock is rupees room. Obviously, he made some mistakes, help him find the vulnerability to open the door. PS: He used the following command to get cipher.txt ```sh python run.py -c clear_text.txt -o flag.enc ```
**Level:** Easy **Author:** Mizu

name: Sanity Check
description: R2Lille{S4niTY_Ch3cK}

name: Hyrule Shop
description:
A new shop has opened in the Hyrule fields! Talking with the vendor, He asked you to help him to handle 100 of his clients for an incredible gift!
**Level**: Easy **Author**: Mizu

name: Anti BF
description: **Level**: Medium **Author**: Mizu

name: Save || Attack
description: **Level**: Hard **Author**: Mizu

name: Aides Sociales
description:
Link is going to deposit some rupees in his bank account. A system message is saying that you can get bonus rupees if your balance is lower that 10 rupees. Try to lower your balance and trick the system!
**Level**: Medium **Author**: Ooggle

name: My first treasure
description:
Searching for some rupees, Link found a website that is hiding a treasure. Find a way to open it!
**Level:** Easy **Author:** Mizu

name: Cross dungeon
description: **Level:** Medium **Author:** Mizu

name: Fantasy galery
description:
A new website as been create to manage a galery. Link was wanted to use it in order to store is beautifull landscape pictures, but before He asked you to check the site security. Can you help him verifying it?
**Level:** Medium **Author:** Mizu

name: Fantasy book
description: **Level:** Hard **Author:** Mizu

name: Key Modifier
description:
Link is going to deposit some rupees in his bank account. A system message is saying that you can get bonus rupees if your balance is lower that 10 rupees. Try to lower your balance and trick the system!
**Level**: Medium **Author**: Ooggle

name: Chest Security Software
description:
Link Forgot the password of his secret rupees chest, but it seems that the software used to ask the password stores it in a very simple way. Try to find the password of link's secret chest!
**Level**: Easy **Author**: Ooggle

name: Super secret passphrase
description:
This time, you want to break a new super secure system in order to get the password. As the hero of the triforce, this will not be that difficult, right ? ;)
**Level**: Medium **Author**: Ooggle

name: Super Crypto System
description:
This is a slightly improved version of the first secret rupees chest. You need to get the password again! Of course this is a different one from earlier.
**Level**: Medium **Author**: Ooggle

name: My first network analysis
description:
Hey link! Someone has exfiltrated data from your computer via a web server! Found what did this person has stole from Link to get the flag.
**Level**: Easy **Author**: Ooggle
